entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries near noon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 along parts of the coast late this evening and overnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 2.
